titles.title: Clean Railroads Act of 2007
A bill to amend section 10501 of title 49, United States Code, to exclude solid waste disposal from the jurisdiction of the Surface Transportation Board.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2371)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
2/28/2007--Introduced.
Clean Railroads Act of 2007 - Excludes solid waste disposal from the jurisdiction of the Surface Transportation Board.
